titleStmt.title: The redemption of time, or, A sermon containing very good remedies for them that have mis-spent their time shewing how they should redeem it comfortably / by William Whately ... ; now published for general good by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
